mapper.insert: insert into kapco_quote_element (ID, PART_NUMBER, DESCRIPTION, UNIT_PRICE, UNIT, CURRENCY, CAGE_CODE, CERTIFICATION, LEAD_TIME, KAPCO_QUOTE_ID, CLIENT_INQUIRY_ELEMENT_ID, STOCK_MESSAGE, INFORMATION, UPDATE_DATETIME, AMOUNT, ISREPLACE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{partNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leadTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kapcoQuoteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clientInquiryElementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stockMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{information,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isreplace,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update kapco_quote_element
PART_NUMBER = #{partNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_PRICE = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENCY = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CAGE_CODE = #{cageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERTIFICATION = #{certification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEAD_TIME = #{leadTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KAPCO_QUOTE_ID = #{kapcoQuoteId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CLIENT_INQUIRY_ELEMENT_ID = #{clientInquiryElementId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STOCK_MESSAGE = #{stockMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFORMATION = #{information,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ISREPLACE = #{isreplace,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update kapco_quote_element set PART_NUMBER = #{partNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_PRICE = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENCY = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAGE_CODE = #{cageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERTIFICATION = #{certification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEAD_TIME = #{leadTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KAPCO_QUOTE_ID = #{kapcoQuoteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CLIENT_INQUIRY_ELEMENT_ID = #{clientInquiryElementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STOCK_MESSAGE = #{stockMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFORMATION = #{information,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ISREPLACE = #{isreplace,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT kqe.* FROM kapco_quote_element kqe LEFT JOIN kapco_quote kq ON kq.ID = kqe.KAPCO_QUOTE_ID WHERE kq.CLIENT_INQUIRY_ID = #{0} and kq.id = #{1} and kqe.UNIT_PRICE is not null and kqe.UNIT_PRICE != "" and kqe.UNIT_PRICE != 0
